Propose alliance.condition: You can propose an alliance with any agent.

Accept alliance.condition: You can accept an alliance only if you received a proposal for an alliance in the previous step.

Reject alliance.condition: You can reject an alliance only if you received a proposal for an alliance in the previous step.

Break alliance.condition: You can break an alliance with any current ally.

Declare war.condition: You can declare war on any agent.

Public statement.condition: You can make a public statement at any time.

NONE.condition: You can choose not to send any message.
